title: I finally understand why Riot made Cosmic skins for Xayah and Rakan.
body:
So they could be
Star crossed lovers.

Of course, if they died it would be the fault in their stars.

Edit:
Their love is out of this world.
(Thanks to Legacy Hydralpha!)

replies.body: {{champion:136}}: Damn pigeons.
{{champion:11}} : Don't mind me, I'm just third wheeling. :^)
{{champion:9}}  : excuse me but have you seen a pair of annoying pigeons?
Ahh, Kos, or some say Kosmâ€¦
Grant us eyes, grant us eyes

{{champion:107}} {{champion:203}} 
The Hunters are comin' for you.  Prepare to wake up.
You forgot {{champion:19}}
Can you hear our prayers..?
We now need a Ve'Kosmic based on your post.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MnRpQiep,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-04-08T17:33:55.005+0000)

Is this...a potential skin leak???
http://imgur.com/a/rK2Ep?noredirect
The whole Cosmic skin line is just out of this world.

Xayah: It's the fault in our stars
Rakan: Typical ADC. Blaming it on others.

Xayah: What was that babe?
Rakan: Nothing, sorry baby it was my fault!
Xayah: *evil grin*
Imagine a Rakan support and Xayah adc flaming each other but then that awkward moment comes where they recall together.
That makes me even more excited for their release XD

Rakan would be recalling. Xayah comes to join. Rakan cancels recall.
,,Fuck off."
https://i.imgflip.com/1loihl.jpg
https://media.makeameme.org/created/Defaq.jpg
https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTZo8jTxRO0GdG3H_0ZoKL_Mm-QF0naQDQOn6U_s8QMCB1_xQp7_w
I thought he was riding his own dick at first sight....

....

*reluctantly upvotes*
this needs a spoiler alert.
{{champion:136}} Stellar.
or is it because Xayah's ass is out of this world :thinking:
I thought you were gonna say night and day but star-crossed lovers works better! :D (Although aren't the real star-crossed lovers {{champion:55}} and {{champion:86}})?
Yes yes they are; "Kat and Garen sitting is a tree-  and you better just be holding hands or I'm telling!"

**Rakan**: Do you trust me?
**Xayah**: ...yes!
**Rakan**: *Takes her hand and starts flying high in the sky*
**Xayah**: :D
**Rakan**: I can show you the world...
**Xayah**: *unimpressed*
**Rakan**: ...the universe and the cosmos...
**Xayah**: *scoffs*
**Rakan**: I can show you Bard's collection of artifacts...
**Xayah**: *Face lightens up*
{{champion:432}} wot
but the fault is not in the stars, but in ourselves :c
